translation.en: [woman] I'm sick of it, sis. I can't breathe here.

translation.en: They make you stand there and wait, like you're some sort of reprobate or something.
translation.ja: 出来損ない扱いして待たせてくる

translation.en: Like you're shit on the sole of their shoe!
translation.ja: 靴の底のゴミみたいに

[under breath] Wonderful morning. [aloud] Wonderful morning, isn't it?
And you're looking just divine, as usual.

メアリーは立派な働き者よ

translation.en: Trends are always changing, aren't they?

translation.en: What address is the vehicle registered to?
I share the car with my wife, and we recently had a breakup, you see.

〝メアリー･ウィリアムズ＃〞 どうも

translation.en: I'll just tear up the ticket. Great.

translation.en: -She hasn't accepted my request. -Just be patient.

translation.en: I can't look at her photos unless she accepts it!
translation.ja: 未承認だと写真が見られない

translation.en: Don't forget why we came here. You get?

translation.en: [Neve] So, yes, I'd just had tea with Amanda, and I…

translation.en: [Neve] No phones at the table, Mary.
Where's your mum at? Been dreaming about her.

translation.en: [patronizingly] Ooh! Let me know when you're ready to man up, freak.

translation.en: -[Neve] Off to class with you. -[bully] Fuckin' inbreds.

translation.en: -It's what happens when you're different. -[Neve] Sebas.
translation.ja: 俺らは人と違う セバス

translation.en: It's kinda shit when your mum's the deputy head.

マーヴィンだ セバスだ

translation.en: [Carl] Shouldn't let people treat you like that.
-You got a light? -Uh… I didn't think that…

translation.en: It's all white label now. No graphics.

でも俺たちは吸うよな

translation.en: [tuts] Oh, you… Take that down, man. Yo, like this.

translation.en: [Neve] Who? This is the game you wanna play with me?
-[Sebastian] I bought them. -[Neve] Don't treat me like a fool!

translation.en: Brotherly Cover, how can I help?
translation.ja: ブラザリー･カバーです

translation.en: -See you later. -[Neve] Jessie's dropping you back?
[Mary irritably] Yes, Mum. Yes. Love you. Bye.

translation.en: [Dione] Good. I'm good. I'm excited for this party.
translation.ja: 今日の会を楽しみにしてた

translation.en: [Carl] Did good, man. You did good.
Thanks, man. And I thought it was dope when you whistled.
translation.ja: ありがとう指笛もイケてたよ

translation.en: First time for everything. Ain't no shame in that.
Yo, this is some Alice-in-Wonderland shit.
[slurring] Let us see what's in here.
Pick what you want. Try anything.
translation.ja: 何でも好きに着てみて

translation.en: Just look at all these cakes. We're like…
translation.ja: 見てよ　この大量のケーキ

translation.en: -You'd look killer in it. -I'll wear it to prom.
translation.ja: 絶対 似合う プロムで着る
プロムって映画みたいな？

translation.en: -Prom like in the movies? -Yeah. You never been to one?
translation.ja: プロムって映画みたいな？ 行ったことないの？
一度も… ママがパーティーを開く来てよ
ママがパーティーを開く来てよ

translation.en: It'll be fussy, but there'll be a lot of free food and drink. [chuckles]
translation.ja: 堅苦しいけど食べ放題だよ

translation.en: [US accent] What do you reckon, homie?
I bet you've always… been the favorite.

translation.ja: 大切にされてきた 別に

translation.en: She tucks you into bed. And sings to you when you sleep, doesn't she?
translation.ja: 彼女に毎晩寝かしつけてもらった？

translation.en: [angrily] And that makes it all right when the meanies are out and about.
translation.ja: 意地悪な子たちから守ってもらった？

translation.en: Can't wait till this all comes out.
translation.ja: 全部 暴かれるのが楽しみだね

translation.en: Just got to go to the bathroom.
translation.ja: 別に　トイレに行きたいだけ

translation.en: [Sebastian] So, what brings you to Combe?
[Carl] Thought I'd add some color to the place.
[Sebastian chuckles] Yeah, there ain't no other Blacks around.

translation.en: No. I mean, I guess I'm kinda…
Thinks she's white. Never says anything about her past.

マジかよ 黒人文化は禁止だ

translation.en: Shit, man. This weed is strong. Where'd you get it?
translation.ja: この大麻 キツいなどこで手に入れた？

translation.en: [Carl] You think you'd survive that drop?
Do you think you'd survive it?
Lean over the edge and have a look.
translation.ja: 身を乗り出して 見ろ

translation.en: -Why? -I thought you were on this man shit!
translation.ja: なんで？ 男らしく やれ！
下をのぞき込め　今すぐ

translation.en: Now you're ready for the next level.
-You need to stop picking on my bro. -[whimpering]
[Carl] Do it, Sebas. Do it now!
[Carl] What the fuck are you waiting for?

translation.ja: あの子？ パーティーした
愛されてるメアリーと
何を考えてる？ 何も！

translation.en: Nothing's wrong with me, okay? I'm done pretending.
translation.ja: 演じるのが嫌になっただけ

translation.en: We should up and leave now.
[Dione] We've been invited to the gala.
translation.ja: パーティーに呼ばれた

translation.en: I never got to go to prom.
Sure you wanna go through with this?
translation.ja: 本当に やりたいか？

translation.en: This is all you! It's all you!
translation.ja: なんで あなたばっかり？

translation.en: Get off me! It's all you! No! Why?!
translation.ja: どうして１つもくれないの！

translation.en: No, you didn't let me get one day!
It looks to me like your two Black children just showed…
translation.ja: 君の子供じゃないのか？

translation.en: "See?" This is somehow on me? You're, you're, you're gonna explain…
translation.ja: 僕が悪いとでも？ 説明してくれ

translation.en: -[Sebastian] Why didn't you tell us? -They grew up with their father. He…
translation.ja: 隠してた？ 父親と暮らしてた

translation.en: He was a bad man. I…
I had to escape, so I, I, I, just…

translation.ja: 子供たちを捨てたんだな
私は… 最悪だよ　どうかしてる

translation.en: -This is so, so fucked! -Let her explain. Mum, tell us how…
translation.ja: 最悪だよ　どうかしてる ママの話を聞こうよ

translation.en: Don't make out you would have been up for raising two Black children who weren't yours, Ian!
translation.ja: 黒人の他人の子供を育てられたとでも言うの？
隠してた 聞かれなかった

translation.en: No. No, that's not fair. I could have. Um… Maybe?
translation.ja: うちで育てられたかもしれない

translation.en: I did what I had to do. What fathers do all the time.
translation.ja: 世の父親たちと同じことをしたの

translation.en: No, they haven't gone about things conventionally.
translation.ja: 普通の親子の再会ではなかった

translation.en: There is something that I have to do.

translation.ja: 釈明は そのあとで

translation.en: [woman] Hey. Can I get you guys anything?

translation.ja: 待ち合わせだ 分かったそろったら呼んでね

translation.en: Just let me know when your third party arrives.
translation.ja: 分かったそろったら呼んでね

translation.en: Have you ordered anything? Is there anything you want?
-Thanks for agreeing to meet with me. -[woman] Hey, team!
Specials are at the bottom. Can I get you anything to drink?
translation.ja: 季節のメニューは下よお飲み物は？

translation.en: -We don't stock alcohol… -Just… Maybe just some tea.
translation.ja: お酒は… 紅茶でいい
気づかないほど大きくなったね

translation.en: -I hardly recognized you. -What happened to your accent?
translation.ja: 気づかないほど大きくなったね そのアクセントは？

translation.en: No, no, I'm a proud Black woman. Proud.
translation.ja: 黒人であることに誇りを持ってる

translation.en: I'm so sorry for my outburst. I…
I don't know what came over me. I've been under the most amount of stress, and…
translation.ja: ストレスのせいでおかしくなって…
ええ　そうよ ディオン

translation.en: That's what I'm here to do.
[spluttering] It hasn't been a straightforward journey.
translation.ja: 楽な道のりじゃなかった

translation.en: There have been things that have happened that…
translation.ja: いろいろなことが起きて…

translation.en: You said you were going to the hairdressers, 18 years ago.
translation.ja: 18年前に美容室に行ったきり

translation.en: -Your father, he was a very dangerous man. -You weren't exactly perfect either.
translation.ja: ２人の父親は暴力的で… 父親が悪い？

translation.en: I don't know if you remember what it was like.
translation.ja: コールドハーバーでのことを覚えてる？
コールドハーバーでのことを覚えてる？ 誘導尋問？
違う なぜ私たちを置いていったの？

translation.en: -Why didn't you take us with you? -I left you with your auntie.
translation.ja: なぜ私たちを置いていったの？ おばさんに預けた

translation.en: She gave us away. She didn't want us.
translation.ja: おばさんにも捨てられたよ

translation.en: [woman] Careful, guys! The tea is super hot.
translation.ja: 超熱いから気をつけてねやけどすると…

translation.en: -Don't want anybody to scald themselves. -Would you fuck off!
translation.ja: 超熱いから気をつけてねやけどすると… うせろ！

translation.en: I should have written. I should have reached out.
translation.ja: 連絡くらいするべきだった

translation.en: I can't imagine what you must think of me. I'm still struggling to process it myself.
translation.ja: 自分でも何を考えてたのか分からない

translation.en: Are we… going to move in?
And I've been thinking of how I can make things right.
translation.ja: 何をすべきか考えてきた

translation.en: And it appears to me that, right now, it's important that you both are able to get back on your feet.
translation.ja: 今は２人の生活の安定が最優先だと思う

translation.en: I wish I could give more. Maybe I can. Down the line.
translation.ja: いずれはもっと渡せるはず

translation.en: If you go back to London, it will give you a chance to get back on your feet.
translation.ja: ロンドンで生活を立て直すのに使って
そのとおりよ ディオン

translation.en: Until we can find a way to work it all out.
translation.ja: 全員が幸せになる方法を探す

translation.en: I've broken it down into two separate checks to avoid arguments.
translation.ja: もめないように小切手は２つに分けてある

translation.en: [Neve] There's no excuse for my behavior.
translation.ja: 言い訳のしようもない

translation.en: Who knows what would have happened if I'd stayed?
I saw an opportunity, and I went for it.
translation.ja: チャンスに飛びついた

translation.en: All this is just restless curiosity.
translation.ja: どうしても知りたかった

translation.en: People need to know who they are.
Where they're from. Like… on those programs.
translation.ja: ＴＶ番組みたいにルーツを探りたい

translation.en: -Will we ever see them again? -Don't you even want to?
translation.ja: また会える？ 会いたいだろ？

translation.en: We need to heal a bit first. Don't we?
translation.ja: まずは落ち着かないと

translation.en: Now it's important to rebuild our defenses and remember that we love each other.
translation.ja: 愛を再確認して家族の絆を強めないと

translation.en: We are a family. Whatever happened before doesn't change that.
translation.ja: 何があろうと僕らは家族なんだ

translation.en: There will be many more conversations to come.
translation.ja: 言い争いも増えるだろう

translation.en: [TV narrator] Together, they can better defend their territory.
translation.ja: 協力して縄張りを守ります

translation.en: Now this is… Gosh, this is…
It is one of the nicest… Oh my gosh, look at this ring!
translation.ja: 信じられない　見てください

translation.en: -[Dione] Think I might have a bath. -[Carl] Have you got a clean towel?

translation.en: [Neve] What are you doing, taking a bath at this hour?
[Carl] Know where the clean towels are kept?
[Dione] I checked the cupboards but couldn't find any clean ones.

translation.en: Right, okay. You never mentioned you were coming round.
translation.ja: 家に来るとは聞いてないわ

translation.en: [Carl] It's Abigail's birthday. We thought it would be a great idea to bring it in together.

セバス 元気か？起こして悪いな

translation.en: -Didn't mean to wake you. -[Dione] Hey, M!
translation.ja: セバス 元気か？起こして悪いな メアリー いいパジャマね
メアリー いいパジャマね

translation.en: -Please, I know how you must be… -[Dione] Where do you keep clean towels?

translation.en: [Carl] Is it washday, Mum? Ian, washday?
translation.ja: 洗濯の日か？ イアン そうだろ？

translation.en: We'll do it like that. On me.
I like the hair. You bringing it back to the '90s?
I'm going Singapore noodle and sweet-and-sour chicken.
translation.ja: シンガポール･ヌードルとサワーチキン

translation.en: Mary, go and get the house phone so we can put the order in.

さあ 本日の主役は？
チキン炒麺(チャーメン)も
メアリー メモしてくれ
メアリー メモしてくれ 僕は知らなかったんだ君たちとニーヴが…

translation.en: I was totally unaware of what happened in the past with Neve…
translation.ja: 僕は知らなかったんだ君たちとニーヴが…

translation.en: Oh… It was a terrible mix-up.
It's all just been a terrible confusion. I mean, I…
translation.ja: 混乱してたの　だから…

translation.en: We don't condone what she did. We demanded answers too, like the two of you.
translation.ja: 僕らも許してない誠実な回答を求めてる

translation.en: Now you, Sebas. I seen you on the court. I know you got an appetite.
translation.ja: セバスバスケで腹が減っただろ
エビせんべいとチャーハン

translation.en: Gonna be a feast. I like.
I clocked a gym back there.
[mocking disbelief] A gym, you know? In the house.
We should do a family photograph.
[Carl] After we sorted the order, we can do a family photo.
But it's my turn to be in the middle.
translation.ja: 今日は私が真ん中だよ

translation.en: -I'll just have a bit of everyone else's. -You sure? I'm buying.
translation.ja: 余り物でいい 本当に？ おごりだぞ
メアリー 電話しろ

translation.en: [shakily] Shall I turn the water off?
[machine] I'm sorry, but we're currently closed.
Our opening hours are 12:00 to 11:00, Monday to Sunday. Please call back later.
translation.ja: 正午から夜11時までにおかけ直しください

translation.en: They got Uber Eats in Castle Combe? Ian.
translation.ja: Uber Eatsは使えるのか？ イアン？

translation.en: Take my phone, Mary. You find a Chinese.
Now… I know you must be hurting…
-Would you repeat? -I know you must be in pain…
[Mary] Yep. I found a good one.
[Dione] Aren't you gonna wish me happy birthday?
[Carl] Come on. It's her fucking birthday.
Well, don't just stand there. Sing!
translation.ja: 立ってないで… 歌え！
ハッピーバースデー　　　　　　トゥーユー
ハッピーバースデー　　　　　　トゥーユー

translation.en: -[Neve] ♪ Happy birthday, dear Dione ♪ -[others] ♪ Happy birthday, dear Abi ♪
translation.ja: ハッピーバースデー -ディオン-アビー

translation.en: We got no board game ting.
-We must've missed a fair few board games. -[Dione] Mmm. On Christmases and birthdays.
translation.ja: 俺たち 何回遊び損ねたんだろう

translation.en: How many birthdays is that anyway? Fifteen?
Yes, I believe we have Scrabble somewhere.
translation.ja: どこかにあったはずだ

translation.en: [Carl] Sebas. You go with Abs and find the board game while we set the table up.
translation.ja: セバスはアビーと捜せ俺たちは準備する

translation.en: Set the fucking table, will ya?
Did you write the check or did she?
The 20K she just tried to buy us off with.
You tried to pay them off?
We could have given more. I was just trying to help.
Neve, what the hell is wrong with you?
But what could I get for that? It's about a grand for each year, right?
translation.ja: 何が買える？ １年につき1000ポンド

translation.en: Wetting the bed until just recently.
translation.ja: 最近まで おねしょ

translation.en: What you buying back with yours, Abs?
[Dione] I told you already. I'm paying off the meanies.
translation.ja: そのカネで意地悪どもを追い払う

translation.en: And all the things they've done.
[Carl yelling] You do that, sis! You do exactly that!
translation.ja: そうだ　そうしてやれ

translation.en: But for now, we're just buying back Cheryl.
translation.ja: 今はとにかくシェリルを取り戻す

translation.en: This has always been a family favorite.
translation.ja: いつも そうするの

translation.en: Seems the perfect way to introduce Carl and Dione to the flock.
translation.ja: ２人が家族に溶け込むいい機会よ

translation.en: I see now, this is as it should be, isn't it?
With all of us gathered around.
translation.ja: 家族みんなで集まるの

translation.en: [Sebastian] Dad, stop it. Can't we try?
translation.ja: 父さん 頑張ってみようよ
最高ね　ねえ あなた

translation.en: [Sebastian] Mum? Dad? What have you got?

translation.ja: ええ ちょっと待ってね

translation.en: Let's see, what word do we have here? Ian?
translation.ja: イアン 何が作れる？

translation.en: [quavers] Yeah. [fakes positivity] What have we got?

translation.ja: ウケる 面白いでしょ

translation.en: Let me know when you want to do that photograph, Dione.
translation.ja: 写真を撮りたくなったら言って

translation.en: [Dione] I wanna play the game! It's my birthday! I get to choose!
translation.ja: ゲームしたい私の誕生日だよ

translation.en: -[Neve] I'm sure we can find another game. -Me and Ian are gonna do a little workout.
translation.ja: 別のにしましょう 俺とイアンは筋トレする
父さんを傷つけないで
俺たちは家族だぞ　なあ？

translation.en: I'll be all right. I'll talk to him.
translation.ja: 大丈夫　話をしてくる

translation.en: [Carl] What kinda KG you pushing these days?
Must be more than a bit.
[Neve chuckling] Aren't you funny? Yes, something like that.
translation.ja: ええ そんなところよ

translation.en: Not sure I've delivered here before. Nice house.
translation.ja: この豪邸に来た記憶はない

translation.en: We didn't think we'd find anywhere, what with it being so late.
translation.ja: こんな時間だから他で頼めなくて

translation.en: Let me get you a tip for being so accommodating.
translation.ja: 助かったからチップを渡す

translation.en: -You ain't walking away that easy. -[Ian gurgles]
You made your bed with us.

translation.ja: あった　見つかったわ

translation.en: I'm very sorry for how this has turned out.
I hope one day you can forgive me.
Let me tip the man, and then we'll eat and discuss.
translation.ja: チップを渡したら話し合いね
